extension.valueString: This value set contains a point-in-time expansion enumerating the codes that meet the value set intent. As new versions of the code systems used by the value set are released, the contents of this expansion will need to be updated to incorporate newly defined codes that meet the value set intent. Before, and periodically during production use, the value set expansion contents SHOULD be updated. The value set expansion specifies the timestamp when the expansion was produced, SHOULD contain the parameters used for the expansion, and SHALL contain the codes that are obtained by evaluating the value set definition. If this is ONLY an executable value set, a distributable definition of the value set must be obtained to compute the updated expansion.

name: MyPAINAllQuestionnaireCodes
title: MyPAIN All Questionnaire Codes
description: Value set for All Questionnaire Codes used in the MyPAIN Questionnaire

concept.display: How often have Exercises at home (such as those assigned by a therapist) or outside (such as walking, jogging, swimming) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often have Sleep positioners or devices (such as additional pillows, padding, etc.) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Stretching you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Weight loss or changes in your diet you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Setting and reaching activity goals you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Ice or heat therapy you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Physical therapy you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Acupuncture you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Chiropractic treatment you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often have Other strategies or methods you have tried in the last 6 months helped with your pain? Please describe

How often have Pain relievers (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, Tylenol) you can buy without a prescription from your doctor that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have Herbal or nutritional pain relievers (such as ginseng or kava kava) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have Cremes, lotions, gels or patches applied to the skin (for example Bengay, Tiger Balm or BioFreeze) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
Have you used any Other items you can buy without a prescription from your doctor to help with your pain in the last 6 months? Please describe
How often have prescription Opioid medications (such as hydrocodone, oxycodone, codeine, morphine and fentanyl) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have prescription Cortisone injections (a shot to relieve inflammation) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have prescription Non-opioid medications as prescribed by a doctor (such as Celebrex, Cymbalta) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Medical marijuana helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
Have you used any Other prescription medications to help with your pain in the last 6 months?: Please describe
How often has Yoga helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Massage helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Meditation helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Relaxation or mindfulness-based training helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Group or individual therapy for pain helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Cognitive behavioral therapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Acceptance and commitment therapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Sleep management (such as a sleep study or CPAP) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
Have you tried any Other mind-body techniques or therapies to help with your pain in the last 6 months? Please describe
How often has Aromatherapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have Crystals helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have Essential oils helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has CBD oil helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Music therapy helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
Have you tried any Other new treatments to help with your pain in the last 6 months? Please describe
What are your most important activity goals? For example: I’d like to be able to walk without pain.
What are the biggest barriers to achieving your activity goals? For example: I have a lot of stress from work which makes my pain worse.
What type of HEAD pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of NECK pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of SHOULDERS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of ARMS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of UPPER BACK pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of LOWER BACK pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of HANDS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of ABDOMEN pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of PELVIS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of HIPS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of UPPER LEGS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of KNEES pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of LOWER LEGS pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of FEET pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What type of EVERYWHERE pain have you had in the last 7 days?
What OTHER pain have you had in the last 7 days? Please describe
Did the patient view the 4 flat tires video
Did the patient access the US Chronic Pain website
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statement: Using the MyPAIN tool has helped me begin preparing for a conversation with my provider about managing my pain.
Do you have any other feedback or thoughts to share on your use of MyPAIN?
When did the patient submit their questionnaire response?
How intense was your pain at its worse in the past 7 days [PROMIS]
How intense was your average pain in the past 7 days [PROMIS]
What is your level of pain right now [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your day to day activities in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with work around the home in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your ability to participate in social activities in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your household chores in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with the things you usually do for fun in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your enjoyment of social activities in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your enjoyment of life in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How much did pain interfere with your family life in past 7 days [PROMIS]
